law.catch_line: A person may not keep a juke box for public entertainment in Harford County unless the person has a ...

text.section: A person may not keep a juke box for public entertainment in Harford County unless the person has a Harford County juke box license that covers that juke box.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine of $100.
